product.title: Cosmopolitan Hot Airstyler Brush (Blue/Silver)
product.description: Achieve beautiful blowouts with ease in a fraction of the time with the Blue/Silver Hot Airstyler Brush from Cosmopolitan. The versatile brush design sides created to smooth hair and helps craft volume from the roots down to beautifully curled ends. The ionic technology helps maintain a neutral charge on the hair's surface, leaving the hair looking conditioned and smooth, while helping reduce frizz and static. It's great for all hair types and comes with a rotating temperature control providing ultimate styling control. The 3 heats settings include a cool setting allowing this brush to be used on all hair types. The nylon and ball-tipped bristles provide comfort and control while styling. The lightweight design and soft-touch finish provide a relaxed grip. It's equipped with a 5.7 ft. professional cord, giving you free range of movement and all the reach you need. It also has a 360deg swivel cord for convenient styling.

Achieve beautiful blowouts with ease in a fraction of the time with the Blue/Silver Hot Airstyler Brush from Cosmopolitan. The versatile brush design sides created to smooth hair and helps craft volume from the roots down to beautifully curled ends. The ionic technology helps maintain a neutral charge on the hair's surface, leaving the hair looking conditioned and smooth, while helping reduce frizz and static. It's great for all hair types and comes with a rotating temperature control providing ultimate styling control. The 3 heats settings include a cool setting allowing this brush to be used on all hair types. The nylon and ball-tipped bristles provide comfort and control while styling. The lightweight design and soft-touch finish provide a relaxed grip. It's equipped with a 5.7 ft. professional cord, giving you free range of movement and all the reach you need. It also has a 360deg swivel cord for convenient styling.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
